```
apiVersion: apps/v1beta2
kind: Deployment
metadata:
 name: Jenkins
spec:
 ...
 template:
 ...
 spec:
 containers:
 - name: Jenkins
 image: vfarcic/Jenkins
 env:
         - name: JENKINS_OPTS
 value: --prefix=/Jenkins
 volumeMounts:
 - name: jenkins-home
 mountPath: /var/jenkins_home
 - name: jenkins-creds
 mountPath: /run/secrets
 volumes:
 - name: jenkins-home
 emptyDir: {}
 - name: jenkins-creds
 secret:
 secretName: my-creds
 defaultMode: 0444
 items:
 - key: username
 path: jenkins-user
 - key: password
 path: jenkins-pass
...  
```

```
kubectl apply -f secret/jenkins.yml

kubectl rollout status deploy jenkins  
```

```
POD_NAME=$(kubectl get pods \
 -l service=jenkins,type=master \
 -o jsonpath="{.items[*].metadata.name}")

kubectl exec -it $POD_NAME \
 -- ls /etc/secrets
```
